system.requirement: Once you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.b643d9ea53ff8d98]{Forge a Bond} with your animal or beast companion and unlock every ability of the Animal Kin asset...

abilities.description: When you make the Companion @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm} move for your beast or animal companion, you may choose to suffer the -health in place of your companion. If you do, reduce the -health suffered by 1 and add +1 when you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.fdb51ee928b4fca2]{Endure Harm}.
Increase your beast or animal companion's maximum health by +1.

Your beast or animal companion has a higher intellect, stronger bond, and improved communication with you. When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.25421995c803340e]{Sojourn} with them, add +1 or take +1 more for your chosen action on a hit (decide before rolling).
